data.message: The MAIN problem isn't the manufacturer, it's the consumer who can't be bothered to use the plastic recycling bins they are PAYING FOR from the council. Most people just think rubbish collection unfortunately....what they should look at is the profits from recycling the council's make....and once all are on board a community can ask for lower rates. The tools are there to take control but it's easier to be controlled I guess....GG human race 💚
